added option for use folder description

zusatzoption für die ordnerbeschreibung
die beschreibung des iobroker geräteordners für gerätebeschreibung oder ereignisse

используйте описание папки iobroker для описания устройства или событий

opção adicionada para a descrição da pasta de uso
use a descrição da pasta do dispositivo iobroker para descrição do dispositivo ou eventos
2.7.1.nl:
voegde de optie toe voor gebruik van de beschrijving
gebruik de beschrijving van het iobroker apparaat voor beschrijving of gebeurtenissen
2.7.1.fr:
option ajoutée pour la description du dossier d'utilisation
utiliser la description du dossier de périphérique iobroker pour la description de périphérique ou les événements

2.7.1.zh-cn:
增加使用时说明的选择
对装置说明或事件使用零散器装置的描述

2.7.0.en:
added support for  wildcard actions (eg. *_single) ([#116](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.zigbee2mqtt/issues/116))
added error handling optimizations ([more](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.repositories/pull/1976#issuecomment-1382038679))
added option `auth_token` for websocket connection ([#112](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.zigbee2mqtt/issues/112))
websocket timeout increased
2.7.0.de:
unterstützung für Wildcard-Aktionen (z.B. *_single) [#116](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.zigbee2mqt/issues/116)
fehlerbehandlungsoptimierungen [mehr](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.repositories/pull/1976#issuecomment-1382038679)
zusatzoption auth_token für Websocket-Verbindung [#112](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.zigbee2mqt/issues/112)
websocket timeout erhöht
2.7.0.ru:
добавлена поддержка действий дикой карты (например *_один) [#116](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.zigbee2mqtt/issues/116)
добавлены оптимизации обработки ошибок [more](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.repositories/pull/1976#issuecomment-1382038679)
добавлена опция auth_token для подключения к сети [#112](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.zigbee2mqtt/issues/112)
timeout websocket увеличился
2.7.0.pt:
apoio adicional para ações curingas (por exemplo: *_single) [#116](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.zigbee2mqtt/issues/116)
otimizações adicionais de manuseio de erros [mais](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.repositories/pull/1976#comment-1382038679)
adicionado opção auth_token para conexão websocket [#112](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.zigbee2mqtt/issues/112)
timeout do websocket aumentou
